name: CultCode Inštitút vizuálneho umenia
goal: Most of the Institute's processes focus on research into the creation of an open work and dissemination of D.I.Y. In parallel to the main direction, the Institute develops projects aimed at promoting sustainable development, co-operation with the cultural and creative industries, creating collections, disseminating the principle of respecting the needs and rights of future generations as internal development potential instead of mechanically imported development of social and cultural identity.
interests: Culture, Education and training, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: cooperation with the cultural and creative industries sector, specialized educational programs, popularizing visual arts, sustainable development
